summary: This is a grand jury subpoena issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to Deutsche Bank AG, New York Branch / Deutsche Bank Securities Inc. It demands extensive financial records related to Jeffrey Epstein and associated accounts from January 1, 2010, onward, as part of a criminal investigation into violations including sex trafficking laws. The document includes a request for non-disclosure to preserve the investigation's confidentiality.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subpoena seeks all financial records for accounts associated with Jeffrey Epstein from Deutsche Bank, as part of a grand jury investigation into alleged federal criminal violations including sex trafficking.

persons.name: Geoffrey S. Berman
persons.context: Signed the grand jury subpoena as the United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York, authorizing the demand for records from Deutsche Bank.

persons.name: Andrew Stemmer
persons.context: The subpoena is addressed to him at Deutsche Bank's New York branch, indicating he is the point of contact for compliance with the document request.

connections.description: Berman, as U.S. Attorney, is authorizing a grand jury subpoena targeting Epstein's financial records as part of a criminal investigation.
Stemmer, as a Deutsche Bank representative, is the recipient of a subpoena demanding all bank records related to Epstein and his accounts.

events.title: Grand Jury Appearance Date
events.description: The subpoena commands Deutsche Bank to appear before the grand jury or produce requested records by this date.

events.title: Subpoena Issued
events.description: The grand jury subpoena is dated and issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office to Deutsche Bank.

locations: 60 Wall Street, New York, NY 10005 (Deutsche Bank address)
United States Courthouse, 40 Foley Square, Room 220, New York, NY (Grand Jury location)
U.S. Attorney's Office, Southern District of New York, 1 St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
The Silvio J. Mollo Building, One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The subpoena is part of a grand jury investigation into alleged violations of federal criminal law, specifically citing statutes 18 U.S.C. §§ 1591 (sex trafficking), 1594(c), and 2422(b) (coercing minors for prostitution).
It demands an extensive range of financial records from Deutsche Bank related to Jeffrey Epstein and any associated accounts from January 1, 2010, to the present (July 2019).
The U.S. Attorney's Office explicitly requests Deutsche Bank not to disclose the existence of the subpoena to any third party to preserve the investigation's confidentiality.
Jeffrey Epstein's date of birth (01/20/53) and Social Security Number (090-44-3348) are listed to identify the target accounts.
The document indicates the investigation was active and considered 'time-sensitive' as of July 2019, following Epstein's 2019 arrest.
